topics.body:
Jesus christ; furaffinity is still complaining about being bought out.


The complaints in a nutshell:
"Freedom of speech!"
Furaffinity is a private website.
"We weren't notified beforehand!"
Furaffinity is a private website.
"Why can't the website keep independent?"
Cause the site is one huge money pit, the servers are a fucking mess and the coding is too; having professional coders work on the site and hardware upgrades is hardly a detractor.
"IMVU steals my art!"
That one I can sort of agree with, but you can report art theft on IMVU.  It's no different from how all those people on deviantart steal people's art and then sell prints of it.
"This is the worst thing ever!"
....
"The fandom is ending!"
....
"I'm leaving forever!"
See you in two weeks.
"IMVU is a for profit company and for profit companies are evil!"
.... *facedesk*

For every post about legitimate concerns about art theft or how IMVU has a problem with spyware there's about 99 "the world is over!" posts.  Sometimes I feel sorry for site owners cause they have to deal with this shit.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
